channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: Diamond and Pearl
channel.desc: The struggle of time and space, of distorted worlds and alternate dimensions, continues to rage, with Ash and friends once again caught in the middle! Michina Town has a long history and chequered past in relation to the mighty Arceus. Ash and his friends, accompanied by their new companion Sheena, travel in time with Dialga?s help to correct the mistakes of the town?s ancestors before the world crumbles under the power of Arceus' rage.
